name: CreateRumApplication
description:
Create a new RUM application within your organization.

This tool is used to create a new RUM (Real User Monitoring) application in your organization using Datadog's API.

parameters.name: rum_application_name
parameters.description: The name of the RUM application to be created.

parameters.name: rum_application_creation_type
parameters.description: Specifies the type for creating a RUM application. Use `rum_application_create`.

parameters.name: product_analytics_retention_state
parameters.description: Set the retention policy for Product Analytics data from RUM events. Options are 'MAX' or 'NONE'.

value_schema.description: Controls the retention policy for Product Analytics data derived from RUM events.

parameters.name: rum_event_processing_state
parameters.description: Configures which RUM events are processed and stored for the application. Accepted values are 'ALL', 'ERROR_FOCUSED_MODE', or 'NONE'.

value_schema.description: Configures which RUM events are processed and stored for the application.

parameters.name: rum_application_type
parameters.description: Specifies the type of the RUM application. Expected values: `browser`, `ios`, `android`, `react-native`, `flutter`, `roku`, `electron`, `unity`, `kotlin-multiplatform`.

value_schema.description: Type of the RUM application. Supported values are `browser`, `ios`, `android`, `react-native`, `flutter`, `roku`, `electron`, `unity`, `kotlin-multiplatform`.
